text: Jose Enrique Porto Lareo (born October 21, 1977 in Vigo) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind. He competed at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in cycling. He was the second cyclist to finish in the blind men's 1 kilometer track race. He was the third cyclist to finish in the track speed race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Galician people
